about_the_game:
Overview Step into the role of spaceship crew members awakening from stasis, only to discover your first mission isn’t repairing the ship—it’s repairing your teamwork. This sci-fi cooperative puzzle game challenges you and your partner to solve asymmetric puzzles that test your communication, logical thinking, and problem-solving skills. With each task completed, you inch closer to proving yourselves as the ultimate crew duo, ready for the challenges of deep space.

Key Features

  • Asymmetrical Gameplay: Separated by a barrier, neither player has the full picture. You’ll need to describe what you see, share information, and coordinate carefully to solve puzzles.

  • Sci-Fi Setting: Explore a futuristic training facility aboard a spaceship, filled with sleek, immersive environments designed to sharpen your crew’s synergy.

  • Diverse Puzzles: Face a variety of challenges, from logical riddles to memory tests, dexterity trials, and complex mechanical repairs. Each puzzle requires unique solutions that push your teamwork to the limit.

  • Progressive Challenge: Start with simple tasks to ease into communication before taking on intricate, multi-step puzzles designed to test your collaboration under pressure.

  • Accessible Design: With intuitive controls and a clear focus on communication, the game ensures players of all experience levels can join the fun.

Will you and your partner emerge as the perfect team, or will miscommunication leave your mission—and your training—stalled? The only way forward is Together, Interstellar.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 32/64 bit
  • Processor: i3-4210
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A working microphone to communicate.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Need a working microphone.

short_description: Awoken on your spaceship, you and your partner must solve interconnected puzzles without ever seeing each other's side of the wall. Communicate, cooperate, and uncover the truth in this asymmetrical co-op puzzle adventure.
